title: Time Life Big Bands
description:
These are from my personal vinyl LP collection. The Artwork is fantastic and makes this collection look really good. I know there may be other LPs that go to this collection and if anybody out there has then, i would appreciate it if you record them and scan the artwork and upload it....i would be eternally grateful.

Heres a tip for those new at the craft of restoring LP artwork

LP covers do not fit a scanner very well because they are too big...The way i deal with this is that i scan half of it (with Photoshop) then turn it around and scan the other half...then drag them onto one document and match up the bottom and top half...then when they are aligned real good, i select one of the layers and click the eraser tool and set it at about 65 or 100....then drag the eraser across so that it blends into the botton layer...then i click the  merge layers function...and then do an auto contrast and / or auto color...if that dont look gooed, do an edit/undo and adjust the color and contrast manually....and there you go.

If you see the artwork in this wonderful collection, you will see i did a good job.

Enjoy and please comment.
